content:
DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapter DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapter Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataLake.Store
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataLake.Store.dll

A front end adapter that communicates with the DataLake Store. This is a syncrhonous call adapter, which has certain efficiency limitations. In the future, new adapters that are created should consider implementing the methods asynchronously.

Edit

In this Article

public class DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapter : IFrontEndAdapterPublic Class DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapter
    Implements IFrontEndAdapter

Concatenate(String, String[], Boolean) Concatenate(String, String(), Boolean)

Edit

Concatenates the given input streams (in order) into the given target stream. At the end of this operation, input streams will be deleted.

public void Concatenate(string targetStreamPath, string[] inputStreamPaths, bool isDownload = false)Public Sub Concatenate(targetStreamPath As String, inputStreamPaths As String(), isDownload As Boolean = False)
Parameters
targetStreamPath
String String

The relative path to the target stream.

inputStreamPaths
String[] String()

An ordered array of paths to the input streams.

isDownload
Boolean Boolean

if set to true [is download], meaning we will concatenate the streams on the local machine instead of on the server.

Exceptions
TaskCanceledException TaskCanceledException

DeleteStream(String, Boolean, Boolean) DeleteStream(String, Boolean, Boolean)

Edit

Deletes an existing stream at the given path.

public void DeleteStream(string streamPath, bool recurse = false, bool isDownload = false)Public Sub DeleteStream(streamPath As String, recurse As Boolean = False, isDownload As Boolean = False)
Parameters
streamPath
String String

The relative path to the stream.

recurse
Boolean Boolean

if set to true [recurse]. This is used for folder streams only.

isDownload
Boolean Boolean

if set to true [is download], meaning we will delete a stream on the local machine instead of on the server.

Exceptions
TaskCanceledException TaskCanceledException
